import React from 'react' import {BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch} from 'react-router-dom' import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import axios from 'axios' import StudentHome from './student-home.component' import StudentCourses from './student-courses.component' import StudentProfile from './student-profile.component' import StudentSubmit from './student-submit.component' class StudentApp extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.requestStudent(props.email).then this.state = { student: studentPromise } } requestStudent = (email) => { return axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/students/email/${email}`) .then(res => { return res.data }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) } render () { return(

) } } export default StudentApp
